ValidationRule.description: Implementation Year is required when Status is changed to design
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Product_Request_Status__c), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName ='Program_Request', RecordType.DeveloperName ='Stand_Alone_Unit_Module_Request'), ISBLANK(Implementation_Year_v2__c), ISPICKVAL(Product_Request_Status__c, 'Design') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “Implementation Year” is required to update the Product Request Status.
